attributes.action: Peers drawing their allowance of £323 should forward it all to Capt Moore's NHS
attributes.additional_details: It is reported that the Peers are insisting on receiving their daily allowance of £323 whilst attending a 'Virtual Lords' from their homes.  This is unacceptable.   The Lords could enhance their extremily poor standing with the populous by such a generous act.
attributes.background: It is reported that the Peers are insisting on receiving their daily allowance of £323 whilst attending a 'Virtual Lords' from their homes.  This is unacceptable.  I want the Government to ensure all this money is forwarded to Captain Tom Moore's HNS Fundraiser.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Donations to charity are a matter for individuals.
